item.description:
Taste of Hartford - Carbone's Restaurant is one of my favorite Italian places in Hartford.  Join me for the special $20.12 3-course dinner or order off the menu.  If we get 12 diners, we will have a private room!  This is going to be a great dinner at a fabulous price for such a high-end restaurant.

It is very important that you show up (less than 12 will incur a charge of $100.00) so if you RSVP "YES" you absolutely must come!!  Not allowed to change RSVP after 7/27/12.  I will collect $1.00 per diner for Meetup fees.

New info: I have set up a "wait list".  If there is enough interest, we can do another table, but it will be in the main dining room, and I will contact the people on the list if I do that.

Website:  http://www.carbonesct.com/menus/

- Betsy

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: CARBONE'S 8/1/12 6:30pm TASTE OF HARTFORD
